p: The region selected for this research purpose has an area of 6116.13 km 2 and is located in between 22°27′ and 23°44′ north latitudes and in between 91°56′ and 92°33′ east longitudes. Approximately 5,08,182 people live here and the main indigenous communities that live here are Chakma, Monipuri, Tripura, Khumi, Marma, Tanchangya, Santal, Mro, and many more.
